pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Mia Mottley of Barbados | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Yesterday, the Prime Minister spoke by phone with the Prime Minister of Barbados, Mia Mottley. Prime Minister Trudeau stressed Canada’s ongoing commitment to supporting Caribbean countries, including Barbados, in building economic and climate resilience. In June, at the G7 Leaders’ Summit in Charlevoix, Canada announced an investment of $162 million to help build strong and resilient coasts and communities, including those in the Caribbean.

The two leaders discussed the importance of developing innovative solutions to challenges faced by the Caribbean and the importance of building upon the G7 engagement with Small Island Developing States. Prime Minister Trudeau recognized the difficult but important steps that Barbados is taking to address debt issues.
